statements: DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE consumption_kwh > 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM meter_location WHERE location = 'Building A'
DELETE FROM meter_location WHERE location = 'New York' AND longitude < -74.000;
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE consumption > 500 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM usage_patterns WHERE meter_id = 2002 AND pattern_type = 'Daily';
DELETE FROM usage_patterns WHERE meter_id = 123 AND pattern_type = 'Peak Demand';
DELETE FROM energy_readings WHERE reading_id = 456 OR meter_id = 789;
